project_abstract.cdata: The project has the following objectives:  (a) to relieve congestion in two major traffic corridors; (b) to improve other national and provincial roads carrying substantial volumes of traffic; (c) to promote the transfer of highway technology through training and the provision of equipment; (d) to further develop institutional capability in highway design, planning and prioritization; and (e) to implement reforms of highway financing.  The project includes:  (a) construction on new alignments of the four-lane divided, access controlled, Foshan-Kaiping Highway and Longgang-Tanxi Highway; (b) a Road Improvement Program for upgrading and rehabilitating about 1,260 km of provincial and national roads; (c) consultant services for construction supervision of the highways; (d) technical assistance to support analysis of highway finances in Guangdong Province and to formulate an action program for implementing reforms; (e) a road safety pilot project; (f) further development of the Road Data Bank and Pavement Management System; (g) purchase of equipment for road laboratories, environmental protection, road research, the road data bank, the pavement management system, road maintenance and highway operations; and (h) staff training.

P003518.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>广东省公路项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的目标是：（1）缓解两条主要交通干线的拥堵状况；（2）改善车流量大的其它国道和省道的条件；（3）通过培训和提供设备促进公路技术转让；（4）进一步发展公路设计、规划和优先排序方面的机构能力；（5）实行公路融资体制改革。项目内容包括：（1）新建佛山至开平、龙岗至谭出入受管制的双向四车道分隔公路；（2）实施公路改造工程，对1260公里左右省道和国道进行升级改造；（3）就公路施工监理提供咨询服务；（4）提供技术援助，支持广东省公路机构开展分析研究工作，制定改革实施行动方案；（5）实施道路安全试点项目；（6）进一步完善道路数据银行和路面管理系统；（7）购置公路实验室、环境保护、道路研究、道路数据银行、路面管理系统、道路养护和公路运行所需设备；（8）开展人员培训。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
